## Public Member Functions

### run() {#ab82707f4044f916e7c0ce1955b987cba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PreservedAnalyses LowerConstantIntrinsicsPass::run (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp; AM)</>}>
Run the pass over the function.

This will lower all remaining &#39;objectsize&#39; and &#39;is.constant&#39;&#96; intrinsic calls in this function, even when the argument has no known size or is not a constant respectively. The resulting constant is propagated and conditional branches are resolved where possible. This complements the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> Simplification and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> Combination passes of the optimized pass chain.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/lowerconstantintrinsics-h/#l00042">42</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/lowerconstantintrinsics-h">LowerConstantIntrinsics.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerconstantintrinsics-cpp/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerconstantintrinsics-cpp">LowerConstantIntrinsics.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
